Body: I created an AWS IoT thing, certificate and a policy then attach policy and thing with certificate. Then installed node-red and use http://127.0.0.1:1880 for creating flow. But when I configure a MQTT
column9:
it got disconnected. The configuration i gave in MQTT in node-red are ::

  • server - AWS Iot -> settings -> endpoint
  • port - 8883
  • Enable secure (SSL/TLS) connection - True (upload all certificates)
  • Topic - "sample"

And deployed but always it shows disconnected.

This is my IoT policy ::
